overview: Colton Harris-Moore, best known as the Barefoot Bandit, was on the run for nearly three years after hot-wiring a Cessna, flying 400 miles before crashing in a field and vanishing into the wilderness. His crimes included a half dozen stolen boats, at least 10 cars and five stolen airplanes.
tagline: The 'Barefoot Bandit' attempts to live up to his larger-than-life persona.
title: Fly Colt Fly
